author: Toni Shope
text:
A locality is looking to dopt a measure that captures their responsiveness in replying to emails, phonecalls, and voicemails. They want to find out how other communities measure responsiveness, both in the actual measure/target they set, and how they physically track responses to verify whether the employee actually responded within the target time. 
Thank you for sharing.
title: Responsiveness in HR Department
